description: On Monday, December 30, the National Electoral Commission adopted the PiS report by resolution, thereby obliging the Minister of Finance to pay PiS the full amount of the subsidy.

title: Morawiecki: The lack of an informal EU summit in Poland is a loss
description: Although Poland took over the presidency of the Council of the European Union on 1 January, the informal summit of EU leaders will be held on 3 February in Brussels.

title: Complaint to the Provincial Administrative Court against the decision regarding Lech Kaczyński Street
description: "The name of the street named after President Lech Kaczyński has been in use in the city of Gdańsk for years," noted the PiS councilor.

title: Negotiations on forming a government in Austria have broken down
description: In Austria it was not possible to form a ruling coalition.

title: Massive failure at German airports!
description: Technical problems led to long queues at the ports of Cologne, Dortmund and Düsseldorf.

title: Trzaskowski spoke about fertility. He was asked about abortion
description: Rafał Trzaskowski spoke at a press conference about the demographic crisis and the need to counteract it.

title: Polish government applies for third tranche of KPO funds
description: Poland applies for the fourth and fifth tranches of money.

title: More than 50,000 Russians are searching for their missing loved ones
description: "According to our estimates, more than 100,000 Russians are missing in total, and that does not include those we already know are dead."

title: Siemoniak mocked Romanowski. Sharp response from PiS MP!
description: "Siemoniak repeats like a mantra that the Ombudsman's report is incorrect, because the court had previously ruled on everything in a final and binding manner and had not found any irregularities."

title: Ukraine plans to produce 30,000 drones and 3,000 missiles
description: "Ukraine must significantly increase the scale of its own bombing of Russian cities"

title: Inauguration of the Polish EU presidency without President Duda
description: Szejna informed that the Hungarian ambassador is "unwelcome for obvious reasons".

title: Hungary reacts to Sikorski's decision: "Pathetic and childish"
description: On 1 January, Poland formally took over the six-month presidency from Hungary.

title: Fired just before Christmas Eve! No salary or documents
description: A huge tragedy in Piła. From one day to the next, about 150 people employed at the Sanita Footwear Poland factory lost their jobs.

title: He announced a radical tightening of the law. On the anniversary of the overthrow of the dictator
description: On the 46th anniversary of the overthrow of the Pol Pot regime and the rule of the Khmer Rouge in Cambodia, the head of the country's senate, Hun Sen, proposed that individuals or groups accused of conspiring against the government of his son Hun Manet should be treated as terrorists.

title: This is how much Poles really earn
description: The median salary in the national economy in July 2024 amounted to PLN 6,641 and was 19 percent lower than the average gross salary - reported the Central Statistical Office (GUS).

title: "If I live to see tomorrow". Jerzy Owsiak writes about threats, there is a reaction from the services
description: The head of WOŚP, Jerzy Owsiak, published an entry in which he reported threats against him. "Very specific threats, with a bomb in the background and the disposal of my person," he wrote. He added that it reminded him of the "baiting" of the murdered mayor of Gdańsk, Paweł Adamowicz. "Officers from the Warsaw Police Headquarters have taken action on the suspicion of a crime," said the spokesman for the Ministry of Interior and Administration, Jacek Dobrzyński.

title: "The whole street disappeared, nothing was left"
description: At least 1,182 hectares of land have already been consumed by the extremely dynamic Palisades Fire, which broke out on the west side of Los Angeles. The fire is spreading rapidly, and authorities fear that "tornado-like" gusts of wind will only worsen the situation. Tens of thousands of people have been ordered to evacuate due to life-threatening conditions.

title: Call to "defeat presidential guards", barbed wire and barricades around residencesWhat will happen in South Korea?
description: South Korea's deposed President Jun Suk Jeol faces a renewed and potentially more aggressive attempt to arrest him for imposing martial law on December 3. On Tuesday, the head of the Central Intelligence Agency (CIO) Oh Dong-woon announced that this time his forces would "do everything (...) with great determination" and that "the second execution of the order will be the last." Buses have appeared around the Jeola residence, blocking access to it, and barbed wire can be seen on the walls.

title: The Roman Empire led to a decline in intelligence in Europe
description: Lead contamination in ancient Rome was so high that it led to a decline in intelligence in much of Europe, according to new research by American scientists. According to their estimates, the IQ of the Roman population in the first centuries of our era could have dropped by an average of 2.5-3 points.

title: Up to 100 percent growth. Dynamic changes in the largest cities
description: The number of available new apartments increased significantly in 2024 - Otodom reported. The report also indicated that at the end of last year, sales in the largest cities decreased by 26 percent year-on-year.

title: To avoid the building, he overturned a truck full of rubble.
description: A truck carrying rubble overturned on national road no. 79 in Koszyce (Małopolska Province). The road is completely blocked, and the police are directing traffic to detours.

title: We will soon know the date of the presidential elections. Hołownia gave the time
description: Sejm Speaker Szymon Hołownia will announce the date of the first round of presidential elections this afternoon, although they will not be formally called until next week. There are three possible dates: May 4, 11 or 18, however, the Speaker announced on Tuesday that there will definitely be no elections during the May Day weekend.

title: At night she went out to drink hot tea. She walked over 20 kilometers along a busy route
description: A senior citizen from Siedlce County walked about 20 kilometers at night along a national road. When traffic police noticed her, she was disoriented and hypothermic. No one had paid her any attention or helped her before. The woman told the officers that she had gone to a gas station to drink hot tea.

title: They detected a specific smell on the ground floor. On the third floor, they discovered a cannabis plantation
description: Police officers from Bydgoszcz have detained a 28-year-old man who may be connected to the cultivation of cannabis and possession of a significant amount of dried plant material. When entering the building, the officers smelled marijuana. It turned out that there was a plantation on the third floor. The man is to face charges related to the cultivation of cannabis.

title: Frost in Mexico. One person died
description: Residents of northern Mexico are struggling with the effects of the second winter storm this season. The negative temperatures were brought by a front known locally as "Front 21". In the city of Chihuahua - the capital of the state of the same name - one person died of hypothermia.

title: A large column of fire, an airfield of strategic bombers nearby. Ukrainians attacked deep in Russia
description: Ukrainian drones have attacked Saratov and Engels in Russia, among other places - media and Russian authorities report. Footage published on social media shows a large fire at an oil depot in Engels, where Tu-95 bombers are stationed, among others.

title: She left a pot on the stove and fell asleep. Police officers took her out of the smoke-filled apartment
description: Police officers took part in a rescue operation in the middle of the night in Praga Północ, where an apartment had caught fire. They led a semi-conscious woman out of the apartment. It turned out that she had left a pot on the stove, which soon began to burn, and she had fallen asleep. Thanks to quick intervention, the 64-year-old did not suffer any injuries.

title: Failure of the Szczecin CHP plant. Possible disruptions in the supply of heat and hot water
description: In the northern areas of the left-bank part of Szczecin, including the city center, there may be disruptions in the supply of heat and hot water. This is related to the failure of the Szczecin Power Plant. PGE, which owns the Szczecin power plant, is trying to diagnose the problem.

title: Massive Warehouse Fire in Bydgoszcz: Possible Cause Provided
description: The cause of the warehouse fire in Bydgoszcz was most likely damage to one of the heating elements. The fire extinguishing operation is still ongoing on site. The management of MMP Neupack Polska assured that due to the production downtime, none of the crew will lose their jobs.

title: Earthquake in Tibet. Number of missing people unknown
description: More than 400 people have been rescued by services after Tuesday's earthquake in Tibet - Chinese authorities reported. The search and rescue operation has been ongoing for several dozen hours and is taking place in difficult conditions with temperatures below zero. So far, 126 people have been confirmed dead, almost 200 injured.

title: Judge Laskowski: when I read it, I felt sorry for the Minister of Finance
description: Supreme Court Judge Dr. Michał Laskowski said in "Rozmowa Piaseckiego" on TVN24 that when he read the resolution of the National Electoral Commission, he felt sorry for the Minister of Finance. - The burden of this decision, which was not easy and unprecedented, was shifted onto him - he stated.

title: Organist allegedly sent pornographic content to children. First hearings and motions to court
description: Seven teenagers have already been questioned in the case of pornographic content that the organist of one of the parishes in Małopolska was supposed to have sent. According to the prosecutor's office, "due to the content of the statements" motions are being submitted to the court to question more minors.

title: An accident in front of tourists. A plane crashed near the island, there are dead and injured
description: A light aircraft with six tourists on board crashed near Rottnest Island off the coast of Perth, Western Australia. Three people died, including the pilot and two passengers.

title: Mirosława Marcheluk has died. She played in a cult comedy
description: Mirosława Marcheluk, a film and theatre actress, known for her role as the Advisor to Her Excellency in "Seksmisja" directed by Juliusz Machulski, has died. She was the director of the Nowy Theatre in Łódź, and a lecturer at the Film School in Łódź.

title: New Orlen exchange rate. CEO's announcements
description: Orlen will take a new course: rational transformation and business acceleration - announced the company's CEO Ireneusz Fąfara in "Rzeczpospolita". He added that the company is starting 2025 by sailing into the ocean of new challenges.

title: 13-year-old hit on crossing. Driver found
description: The driver who hit a 13-year-old girl on a pedestrian crossing in Milicz and drove away has been detained. He is an 81-year-old. The police have released a recording of the accident.

title: 32-year-old dies from stab wounds. One person is under supervision, the other is in custody
description: One person was taken to jail, and the other - a 21-year-old woman - was placed under police supervision. They are suspected of fatally attacking the 32-year-old with a knife. The incident took place on Poltawska Street in Koszalin.

title: "Action Plan" of the Ministry. Poland before the ECJ with a new position
description: The government has presented a new position before the Court of Justice of the European Union on the status of judges. It wants the CJEU to comment on the criteria for examining their independence and the possibility of national courts bypassing provisions that limit the effectiveness of EU law. During the hearing, the attorney representing Warsaw indicated that "according to data from November 2024, 3,142 judges, including judicial assessors, appointed by the new National Council of the Judiciary, adjudicate in Polish courts." This is over 30 percent of all judges.

title: Hitting Children Changes Them for Life: "Their Brains Are Like Veterans with PTSD"
description: When a parent hits a child, there are almost always marks left. Not just tears or bruises. Studies show that it damages the child's brain. And it does so for the rest of their life.

title: They rob cars, ransack houses. Thieves are returning to methods that have not been used for 20 years
description: Five minutes is enough to steal a car. It takes burglars from two to ten minutes to clear out a flat. The number of so-called "fast actions" is also increasing. "Old methods that have not been seen in Poland for the last 20 years are coming back," says a security specialist.

title: Secrets of parents of gifted children. They have a strategy that makes their little ones resolute
description: Children may have different talents, the expression of which depends on, among other things, personality, temperament, place of residence, sometimes disability or neurodiversity. Identification of these traits is the beginning of creative following of the child. How to raise a creative child? Encourage, encourage, or maybe observe and step into the background?

title: Who Are Xennials? This Generation Lives Completely Differently Than Their Parents
description: For millennials who are now forty, the theme song to the series "Forty-Year-Old" contains more incomprehensible sentences than ones they could agree with. A person born in 1980 will not think that "it's closer than further" - he is just entering the best period of his life. And he will burst out laughing at the advice "even though time drives you, laugh at this bastard, you are still capable of a lot", because it is clear to him that he can do as much as the young. Or even more.

title: Is a 70-year-old behind the wheel dangerous? "If only someone tried to take my license away!"
description: – I recently examined a professional driver who is 85 years old, all functions preserved, he did very well – says Andrzej Markowski, a traffic psychologist. That same day, he examined a 55-year-old and it turned out that he can no longer sit behind the wheel. The changes are far-reaching, poor orientation, delayed reactions.

title: The pursuit of happiness is pointless. "It's worth feeling both joy and sadness"
description: Life is made up of many experiences, both good and bad. Each teaches something. It is not worth looking only for what is good and feeling disappointed when something does not happen as we expected. It is worth feeling both joy and sadness - says British writer and illustrator James Norbury.

title: "It's best not to let whales out of the building." Behind the scenes of fun in Las Vegas
description: A former employee of a Las Vegas casino recounted how a "whale" demanded female company, but was so picky that he made up his mind only after viewing nearly a hundred potential partners. The inventiveness of the wealthy who party in casinos seems inexhaustible.

title: The Honeymoon Phase: How Many Times Can We Experience It in a Relationship?
description: Did you know that somewhere out there, in the big wide world, your perfect other half is out there? The person of your dreams and desires, ready to fulfill your every fantasy, satisfy all your needs and live with you in a state of eternal happiness? Yes, of course. Santa Claus exists too. There is no such thing as a perfect partner, just as there is no such thing as a perfect couple (as the old joke goes, there are only two kinds of couples: those who are in a wonderful relationship and those you really know well).

title: Achilles' Diet Was Very Healthy. Here's What Ancient Greeks Ate
description: Traces of ancient Greek cuisine can be found in the cuisine of modern Greece. Two popular gastronomic products of this region have ancient origins. However, the ancient Greeks ate

title: How American Fast Food Conquered the World? "There Could Be a Greater Injustice"
description: For half a century, the fast food chain has encircled the world. Cheap, unhealthy, quickly consumed food has become a culinary symbol of the United States. It is hard to imagine a greater injustice, because the local cuisine is in no way inferior to that of France or Italy.

title: Virus from China reaches Europe. Patient describes symptoms of the disease
description: The dangerous HMPV virus has already reached Europe. Doctors have confirmed cases of infection in Portugal. However, the most serious situation is still in China, and the media is writing about scenes similar to the COVID-19 pandemic. Infection with the HMPV metapneumovirus can be very dangerous. People who have had contact with it recall problems with speaking and breathing.

title: Lukashenko announces handover of power. "They will take Belarus into their own hands"
description: - I am not eternal, I do not cling to power - declares Alyaksandr Lukashenka a few days before the presidential elections in Belarus. The leader predicts that a generational change will soon take place in his country. - A serious test awaits you. We must elect normal authorities, a normal president, a government that will show the path of development of our country - he said, addressing young people.

title: Winter vacation without the crowds. There are secluded and unique places in Poland
description: Zakopane is a popular destination during the winter holidays. The queues for attractions there stretch for kilometres. What can you do to avoid the crowds of tourists? It is worth taking a look at the map and finding a place that offers everything that popular cities and resorts have, plus peace and quiet.

title: They encouraged residents to eat... Christmas trees. A controversial idea from the authorities
description: The Belgian Federal Food Agency (FASFC) has issued a warning to citizens that eating a Christmas tree can have tragic consequences, after the city of Ghent encouraged this method of disposing of the tree as part of its environmentally friendly measures.

title: More accidents and collisions on Polish roads. Police provide data
description: Last year, there were over 21.5 thousand road accidents on Polish roads, in which 1,881 people died and over 24.8 thousand were injured - according to police statistics. Compared to the previous year, the number of accidents increased, but there were fewer drunk drivers.

title: Deputy Speaker of the Sejm appealed to Kosiniak-Kamysz. "Buy yourself a bigger mirror"
description: - If there is a situation in which groups that are fed up with these promises do not go to the elections and Mr. Nawrocki wins the presidential elections, then I will tell Władek Kosiniak - Władek, buy yourself a slightly bigger mirror and look into it more often - said Włodzimierz Czarzasty in the Graffiti program.

title: Luxury Neighborhood on Fire. Major Fire in Los Angeles
description: Firefighters are battling a blaze in Pacific Palisades, an exclusive Los Angeles neighborhood known for its celebrity residences. The blaze broke out in brush and wooded areas near the local beach. 30,000 residents were ordered to evacuate due to the immediate threat to their lives.

title: Lotto Draw Results. Check Winning Numbers
description: On Tuesday, January 7, 2025, the draws for the number games run by Totalizator Sportowy took place. Which numbers turned out to be lucky? Here are the results of the draw: Ekstra Pensja, Ekstra Premia, EuroJackpot, Kaskada, Lotto, Lotto Plus, Mini Lotto, Multi Multi.

title: Masked attacker pulls out gun and starts shooting. Tragic news from Germany
description: At least two people are dead and one is in critical condition after a shooting in Bad Freidrichshall, Germany. Initial police findings indicate that the gunman opened fire, and a manhunt is underway. A police helicopter is also involved in the operation.

title: He is fighting the regime, his son-in-law has been kidnapped. Things are boiling in Venezuela
description: Edmundo Gonzalez Urrutia - recognized by the democratic world as the winner of the last presidential elections in Venezuela - said that his son-in-law Rafael had been kidnapped. This happened a few days before the inauguration of Nicholas Maduro, who is holding on to power by force. Urrutia had to flee his homeland after the elections in July, the results of which were not announced.

title: Emmanuel Macron has angered Chad's president. He is "seething with contempt"
description: - I think he got the era mixed up - said Chadian President Mahamat Idriss Deby Itno, reacting to the words of the French President. Emmanuel Macron argued at a diplomatic meeting that Africa had forgotten to thank Paris for its help in the fight against terrorism. This statement also resonated widely on the Seine.

title: Musk's father on his son: Tell him to go away
description: Elon Musk's strong criticism of the British Prime Minister was met with a blunt response from the father of the Tesla owner and X service. "Don't worry about it. Tell him to go away," said Errol Musk. The 79-year-old also appealed not to repeat his descendant's statements.

title: NATO ships set off for the Baltic Sea. Unofficial findings
description: NATO member states cooperating in the Joint Expeditionary Force will send up to 10 units to protect the Baltic Sea floor, Finnish public broadcaster Yle reported. Their goal is to increase supervision of underwater infrastructure.

title: She only went to the store. Karolina Wróbel disappeared without a trace
description: Karolina Wróbel from Czechowice-Dziedzice left home on Friday to do some shopping and disappeared. She did not contact her loved ones, who are appealing for help in the search. The police are also conducting their own operation, publishing a description of the 24-year-old. Among others, two young sons are waiting for her return.

title: Two bodies found in plane. They were in landing gear bay
description: Two people were found dead on board a plane flying from New York to Florida. The bodies were discovered in the landing gear compartment during a routine inspection. It is not known how or why they got there. An investigation has been launched to clarify the circumstances of the incident.

title: New visa scandal? MFA spokesman: There is no evidence
description: The MFA spokesman commented on media reports that corruption in the Philippines is still ongoing with Polish visas in the background. According to Paweł Wroński, there is no evidence of Polish officials participating in such activities. He added that Warsaw is trying to introduce basic order and regain control over the visa system after a long period of chaos.

title: Driver missed the turn. Surprising view on expressway S19
description: The 33-year-old wanted to take a break from his journey and go to the Service Area. However, the turn did not go smoothly - the driver hit the barriers and his car hung on them. The man was taken to hospital with injuries.

title: Denmark responds to Trump's threats. Prime Minister appeals to media
description: - I can't imagine that it will come to that - said Danish Prime Minister Mette Frederiksen, referring to Donald Trump's words. The US president-elect stated that he could not rule out the use of force to take control of Greenland.

title: Marcin Romanowski's finances hit. Hołownia's clear announcement
description: - Marcin Romanowski will not receive a parliamentary allowance, which results from the law. He is not entitled to a salary - said Sejm Speaker Szymon Hołownia. The former deputy minister of justice from PiS, who is currently in Hungary, can still count on a lump sum to maintain his parliamentary office. This may change if the Sejm passes and the president signs changes to the law.

title: "Intervention": They went from apartments to "kolkhoz". Because the railway is building a tunnel
description: More problems for Łódź residents caused by the construction of the cross-city tunnel. Those who lost their apartments as a result of the collapse of the tenement house were offered 2-3 thousand złoty in compensation. Others returned to such ruined premises that they are afraid to stay there, and still others still have to wander around hotels. Intervention Material.

title: Trump threatens Denmark, wants changes in NATO and on the map. A series of announcements were made
description: Donald Trump announced that as US president he will consider imposing tariffs on Denmark, Reuters reported. In his statement, he mentioned Greenland, which - in his opinion - could belong to the United States. What's more, the future leader does not rule out the use of force against Copenhagen and Panama. He also spoke about changes that should take place in NATO and an artificial border between the US and Canada.

title: Vladimir Putin has ordered a mission in Kursk Oblast. He has chosen a trusted general
description: Vladimir Putin wants to repel Ukrainian attacks in the Russian Kursk region. He decided that his trusted general, Deputy Minister of Defense - Yunus-Bekka Yevkurov - should be sent to the front. The military man was tasked with organizing defense in the sensitive region.

title: Father took his son to the Tatras. He was found by TOPR, who was hypothermic.
description: It was not an easy operation by the Tatra Volunteer Search and Rescue. A father who went on a trail with his eight-year-old son asked for help. However, the weather conditions were so difficult that they were unable to return from the Pośrednia Turnia area to a safe place on their own. The rescuers found them severely hypothermic.

title: 'New Chapter' on Facebook and Instagram: Zuckerberg Reacts to Trump's Return
description: Popular social media is facing major changes. Mark Zuckerberg announced new solutions in platforms owned by Meta - less censorship and cooperation with President Donald Trump. From the context of the actions taken by the billionaire, it follows that it was the Republican's return to the White House that prompted him to make urgent changes.

title: Mysterious shots in Pomerania. Someone damaged a Mercedes, police appeal
description: The owner of the car notified the police that a strange incident had occurred on the property in Pępowo, Pomerania. Someone had damaged a stationary Mercedes and a window in the building by pointing a gun at them. The officers found bullets at the scene. They are also appealing to witnesses for help in finding the perpetrator and denying some of the disturbing information that has appeared in the media.

title: Marcin Kierwiński invited Karol Nawrocki. "I'd love to go with him"
description: - Karol Nawrocki really has nothing to say - assessed Marcin Kierwiński. The Minister for Reconstruction after the Flood also referred to the words of the presidential candidate supported by PiS regarding aid for flood victims. - If he wants to help, then I invite him. I will gladly go with him to the dam in Stronie to show him the monument to the irresponsibility of his PiS buddies - said the KO politician.

title: He hit a 13-year-old girl on a crosswalk and fled. Police from Milicz are looking for the driver
description: A teenager was hit on a pedestrian crossing in Milicz (Lower Silesia Province). The perpetrator - an older man in a dark car - did not help her and drove away. The incident was recorded by surveillance cameras, and the police are looking for the perpetrator. The officers are appealing for help in catching him. This is another similar case recently on Polish roads.

title: Ukrainian military bitter about F-16. He wants better fighters
description: The Ukrainian Air Force spokesman reported the feat of an F-16 pilot who managed to shoot down six missiles, including two using an on-board gun. He added, however, that Kiev needs better aircraft. He expressed bitterness about the radars and combat equipment for fighters that Ukraine has received from its allies.

title: A cold wave will hit Poland again. Temperatures will drop immediately
description: The year 2025 welcomed Poland with an intense attack of winter. The services constantly warned of icy roads and sidewalks, heavy snowfall, gales, and frost. In some regions, at the coldest moments, thermometers showed a dozen degrees below zero. What will the situation look like in the coming weeks?

title: A block of ice broke through a car window. A passenger was seriously injured, and they are looking for the perpetrator.
description: A dangerous incident occurred in Mazovia. A block of ice fell from a moving truck, broke the window of another car and seriously injured the passenger - reported the Garwolin police. The driver of the truck most likely did not even notice the incident. Now the police are looking for him.

title: 14-year-old fatally hit. Government responds, there will be urgent changes
description: - In the coming days, until the end of January, automated access to the CEPiK database will be available for entrepreneurs - announced Deputy Prime Minister, Minister of Digital Affairs Krzysztof Gawkowski. This is the government's response to the tragedy that occurred in Warsaw - there, a driver with a driving ban, working for a courier company, fatally hit a 14-year-old boy.

title: She wanted to transport an unusual animal on a PKP train. "Such a big dog"
description: Passengers on PKP trains may encounter an unusual passenger. Social media has been full of videos documenting the journeys of a ram named Rysiek. Recently, however, the animal was not allowed on board a train from Warsaw to Berlin, which sparked a wave of comments. However, the regulations clearly specify which animals and how they can travel on long-distance trains.

title: Weather Armageddon in Norway: Flights Cancelled, Schools Closed
description: Norway is drowning in snow. Forecasters are predicting snowfall of up to 50 cm. The difficult situation has brought planes, ferries and buses to a halt. It has also affected the functioning of companies and schools in parts of the country where distance learning has been ordered. Forecasters are warning that the weather may only get worse.

title: Damage to cables in the Baltic Sea. New information from the Swedish Navy
description: The anchor of the tanker Eagle S, suspected of damaging undersea cables in the Baltic Sea, has been located at the bottom of the Gulf of Finland and brought to the surface, Finnish radio Yle reported on Tuesday.

title: Jean-Marie Le Pen is dead. The founder of the Popular Front was 96 years old
description: French politician Jean-Marie Le Pen has died at the age of 96. He was the founder of the National Front, a multiple MP and a member of the European Parliament. He ran for president five times. He is the father of French politician Marine Le Pen.

title: Another Accident Involving a Prohibited Driver, 18-Year-Old Fights for Her Life
description: Serious accident in Grodzisk Mazowiecki. A driver of a passenger car hit an 18-year-old crossing a pedestrian crossing. She was taken to hospital in serious condition, doctors are fighting for her life. The driver had a court ban on driving. This is another such accident in recent days.

title: Evacuation of high school in Tarnów. Pepper spray was used in classroom
description: Pepper spray was used in a high school classroom in Tarnów. Thirty people had to be evacuated. According to the fire department, three people needed the care of a school nurse, while two were taken to hospital for further consultations.

title: North Korea boasts about successful test of new missile. 'It will scare away any rival'
description: - The hypersonic missile system will reliably deter any rival in the Pacific region, Kim Jong Un said, announcing the successful launch of the new ballistic missile. According to him, the missile flew about 1,500 kilometers at a speed of 12 times the speed of sound. The dictator wants to make the new weapon a pillar of strategic deterrence.

title: Tragic accident on track. Seven-year-old dies
description: Sad news from Holland. Seven-year-old Sid Veijer has died after a serious accident two weeks ago while training on a go-kart track. The boy was considered a great talent in motorsport.

title: The Word of the Year 2024 has been announced. It is related to Tusk's government
description: The Coalition is the Word of the Year 2024 according to a poll organized by the Institute of Polish Language at the University of Warsaw. Internet users, on the other hand, opted for artificial intelligence. Students took an even different approach, choosing their own word of the year for the first time.

title: What to do with the tree after the holidays? Don't throw it there under any circumstances
description: A beautifully decorated Christmas tree is a traditional decoration in many Polish homes during Christmas. It is decorated in different ways, depending on preferences. Christmas Eve is the time when, according to tradition, the tree should be decorated, although in some homes it has been up since the beginning of December. It is most often taken down after the feast of the Three Kings.

title: He fatally hit a 14-year-old boy. There is a decision on the arrest
description: The District Court of Warsaw - Wola in Warsaw accepted the motion of the Prosecutor and applied a preventive measure in the form of temporary arrest for a period of 3 months to the perpetrator of the fatal accident of January 3, 2025 - Andrzej K. - informed the District Prosecutor in Warsaw. This concerns the accident in which a 14-year-old boy died.

title: Do you have a license plate like this? You can pay up to 500 PLN fine
description: Regular car inspections, engine oil checks and brake pad replacements are just some of the responsibilities of a car owner. Meanwhile, more and more tickets issued by the police concern improper use of license plates. Every vehicle on Polish roads must have plates that meet certain requirements, and ignoring them can cost you dearly.

title: When will the presidential elections take place? Szymon Hołownia has ruled out one date
description: Szymon Hołownia announced that on Wednesday, January 8, he will announce the decision regarding the date of the presidential elections. The Speaker of the Sejm immediately ruled out one of the possible dates. In his opinion, organizing the vote on this date would be completely absurd and against democracy.

title: It's dangerous in the mountains. It's hard to reach Morskie Oko
description: Icy trails, cracking lake surfaces, strong winds and trees breaking - hiking in the mountains is a mortal danger for tourists. TPN appealed for common sense. Reaching Morskie Oko will be a challenge.

title: They Belonged to the King of Poland. Secret Vault Opened
description: An extraordinary discovery has been made in the basement of the Vilnius Cathedral in Lithuania. Researchers have found a secret hiding place where the regalia of the Polish royal family were hidden after the outbreak of World War II. Among them is a crown made for Alexander Jagiellon.

title: Christmas carols without holy water? Few people know how to behave then
description: The first pastoral visits, commonly known as chodzić po kolędzie, will begin soon. This custom originates from the Middle Ages, when priests began visiting the homes of the faithful during Christmas. In the 15th and 16th centuries, the carol had an additional purpose: it was used to combat superstitious practices and confiscate books that the Church considered heretical.

title: Big changes: You'll have to pay to enter the UK
description: From Wednesday 8 December, citizens of 48 countries, including the US, Canada and Australia, travelling to the UK must obtain an Electronic Travel Authorisation (ETA) before arriving in the country. The cost of this document is £10. From 2 April, this requirement will also apply to Poles.

title: Explosion in a block in Orzysz. 18 people evacuated
description: There was an explosion in a multi-family house in Orzysz, possibly gas. The owner of the apartment said that something exploded in his apartment in the morning, which caused a fire. The man was taken to hospital, and the other residents of the block evacuated. Firefighters also had to help a mother and child who were stuck on the balcony. Firefighting operations are still underway at the scene.

title: They got poisoned by Christmas cake. "She wanted to get rid of her mother-in-law"
description: Brazilian police have detained a 42-year-old woman suspected of poisoning a Christmas cake with arsenic. According to investigators, the woman planned to kill her mother-in-law by doing so. Five family members fell ill after eating the cake. Three of them died.

title: A whip for drivers driving under a driving ban. Deputy minister on the details
description: The government wants to tighten the regulations on drivers who break court bans on driving. - We have a certain systemic problem with this category of drivers - admitted Deputy Minister of Justice Arkadiusz Myrcha on Polsat News. He also presented details of changes to the law that are to increase safety on Polish roads.

title: Bus fell into ditch. There are injured people
description: Near the town of Krupe near Krasnystaw (Lublin Province), a coach went off the road and into a ditch where a car was. Three people were taken to hospital. The police warn that the road is blocked in this place and detours are in place.

title: Lotto Draw Results. Check Winning Numbers
description: On Monday, January 6, 2025, the draws for the number games run by Totalizator Sportowy took place. Which numbers turned out to be lucky? Here are the results of the draw: Ekstra Pensja, Ekstra Premia, Kaskada, Mini Lotto, Multi Multi.

title: Krzysztof Sońta is dead. The former PiS MP was 56 years old
description: Krzysztof Sońta, a former PiS MP, former councilor from Radom and long-time director of a local special school, has died. He was 56 years old, and his death was announced by the mayor of Radom, Radosław Witkowski. I will always remember Krzysztof's great commitment and determination - he wrote.

title: Donald Tusk to answer for lack of money for PiS? Prof. Piotrowski: Pregnant threat
description: - The Minister of Finance should comply with the requirements of the Electoral Code and pay out the money to PiS - said Prof. Ryszard Piotrowski in Gość Wydarzeń. The constitutionalist pointed out that if the funds are not paid out, Andrzej Domański will have to answer for his actions. He also pointed out that such a threat also weighs on Prime Minister Donald Tusk.

title: He drove his car into a cemetery, destroyed tombstones. A breakthrough in the search for the driver
description: The services that were called to the cemetery in Nowy Dwór Mazowiecki at night found an unusual sight: a rammed fence, damaged tombstones and an abandoned car, the wheels of which were still turning. The police began searching for the driver, but he - after less than a day - turned himself in to the police station. The 41-year-old was unable to explain how the cemetery was destroyed.

title: Prof. Dudek responds to Kaczyński. "Let them print it"
description: - If you want to know my biography, I recommend Wikipedia, everything is true there. And so is President Kaczyński, let them print it - this is how Prof. Antoni Dudek responded to the words of Jarosław Kaczyński. The PiS leader criticized the political scientist for his strong statement about Karol Nawrocki. As Prof. Dudek mentioned, he counts on the IPN employees to reveal the truth about the situation inside the Institute.

title: He was going to mass, he died in a tragic accident. They say goodbye to the parish priest
description: The 52-year-old parish priest, Fr. Marek Tworek from the Lublin town of Chmielek, has died. According to the police, the man lost control of his car while overtaking and hit an embankment. He enjoyed great respect among the faithful and the local community - local media write about the priest.

title: Donald Tusk's Strong Post. Minister Porowska: I Would Call It Differently
description: If PiS does not receive subsidies, will some Poles take to the streets? The Minister for Civil Society stated that another decision by Andrzej Domański will also spark protests. Adriana Porowska in Gość Wydarzeń also referred to the prime minister's post criticizing the right-wing television. "I would call it differently," she said. She also explained why she should be taken seriously.

title: Kosiniak-Kamysz in strong words. "There is no room for discussion here"
description: - We will defend hunters, we will defend fishermen, we will defend these traditions - assured Władysław Kosiniak-Kamysz. At a meeting with the residents of Tarnów, the leader of PSL explained not to fall into eco-extremism and assured that without the vote of the PSL no amendment or act has passed in the Sejm. - Our vote counts (...), without us there is no majority - added the deputy prime minister.

title: He fatally hit a 14-year-old boy. A new move by the prosecutor's office
description: There is a motion for a three-month arrest for the driver who fatally hit a 14-year-old in Warsaw's Wola district, the prosecutor's office announced in the early afternoon. The man - after being submerged, detained and sobered up - heard the charges, to which he admitted. It turned out that this was not the 43-year-old's first conflict with the law.

title: Weather puts a damper on travelers' plans. Flight delays in Gdansk
description: In the morning, difficult conditions prevailed at Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa Airport, which is why the runway of the Tri-City airport was closed, which resulted in delays. - This traffic is now being unloaded, some planes may have delays of one to two hours - spokeswoman Agnieszka Michajłow told Polsat News.

title: Two bodies in apartment. Family was concerned
description: In one of the apartments in Małomice (Lubuskie Province), the bodies of a 27-year-old woman and a 34-year-old man were found. - Family members could not contact them, so the services were alerted. The entrance door was forced open by firefighters - said Deputy Commissioner Arkadiusz Szlachetko from the police in Żagań in an interview with tvn24.pl. It was probably carbon monoxide poisoning.

title: Serious accident near Łowicz. The fault was... a duck
description: The holiday weekend and difficult road conditions are not conducive to travel. This was discovered by a Fiat driver who, in the town of Oszkowice (Bielawy commune), caused a serious accident while trying to avoid an animal sitting on the road. The man was taken to hospital, and a duck was also injured.

title: Recording from the Wrocław Zoo. "We don't know what to have in your head"
description: Two people came to light fireworks right next to the fence of the Wrocław Zoo on New Year's Eve. We don't know what must be in their heads to ignore all our appeals and deliberately expose animals to such enormous stress - the zoo's representatives write on social media.

title: Baltic scenario in Asia. Undersea cable destroyed
description: Taiwan suspects Beijing of severing a key undersea cable off the island's northern coast. Taipei has discovered that a Chinese-owned vessel dropped anchor and damaged a cable carrying data to a U.S. telecommunications network.

title: "I'm not going to give up." Romanowski reveals his plans for the future
description: - I do not intend to resign from my mandate as a member of parliament, I will continue to perform my duties. We are dealing with lawlessness in Poland - said Marcin Romanowski in Graffiti, who has been enjoying political asylum in Hungary for several weeks. The former deputy minister - in response to unfavorable comments from politicians of the ruling majority - called them clowns, with whom there is no point in arguing.

title: Lotto Draw Results. Check Winning Numbers
description: On Sunday, January 5, 2025, the draws for the number games run by Totalizator Sportowy took place. Which numbers turned out to be lucky? Here are the results of the draw: Ekstra Pensja, Ekstra Premia, Kaskada, Mini Lotto, Multi Multi.

title: A chase through the streets of Częstochowa. A 39-year-old tried to avoid a traffic stop
description: A chase through the streets of the city, an abandoned car, a foot escape and a black bag with white powder - this is by no means a trailer for an action movie, but a day in the life of Częstochowa uniformed officers. Officers from the local traffic police detained a 39-year-old who was trying to avoid a traffic check. The man was charged with five offences, and his fate will be decided by the court.

title: Fatal hit-and-run of 14-year-old boy. Suspect pleads guilty
description: The suspect in the fatal hit-and-run of a 14-year-old boy in Warsaw's Wola district has pleaded guilty, Piotr Skiba, spokesman for the District Prosecutor's Office in Warsaw, told Polsat News.

title: Szłapka: Security is important for the presidency. Skiing is important for the president
description: - The president has recognized what is important to him. Safety is important to the Polish presidency. Skiing is important to the president - said Adam Szłapka, speaking about the Polish EU presidency gala. The Minister for European Union indicated the priorities of the Polish presidency of the Community. He also spoke about money for PiS and, as he stated, - Andrzej Domański is not moving.

title: Fire in Falenica Educational Center. Firefighters Use Lifting Equipment
description: Fire in the District Educational Center in the capital city of Falenica. Several dozen firefighters were involved in the extinguishing action. 29 people were evacuated from the facility - junior brigadier Artur Kamiński from the press team of the Municipal Headquarters of the State Fire Service of the capital city of Warsaw told polsatnews.pl. The deputy minister of justice spoke on the matter.

title: Wrongfully Sentenced to 25 Years? New Investigation Launches
description: This could be a breakthrough. There is a chance that Piotr Mikołajczyk, sentenced to 25 years in prison, will be released. According to many experts investigating this case, the helpless and intellectually limited man could not have killed two women in Tłokinia Wielka near Kalisz. A new investigation into the crime has begun. Intervention Material.

title: Tragedy in Podlasie. A man died after being attacked by bulls.
description: A 68-year-old man died in a bull attack in the town of Grochy-Łętownica in Podlasie. A second man was taken to hospital with injuries. Firefighters had to intervene to help secure the animals.

title: She was transporting a child completely drunk. She wanted to escape the police.
description: Częstochowa police arrested a 34-year-old Ukrainian woman who failed to stop for a road check. The woman tried to escape without success. The officers emphasize that she was completely drunk. What's worse, she was transporting a 12-year-old child. The arrested woman has already heard the charges.

title: Sławomir Mentzen: The Minister of Finance should pay money to PiS
description: The Minister of Finance Andrzej Domański should pay PiS money - said Sławomir Mentzen in a morning interview on RMF FM. "Every official should act within the limits and on the basis of the law" - commented the co-chairman of the Confederation. This issue was also raised by a question from a listener, which Tomasz Terlikowski's guest - the new host of Morning Talk on RMF FM - drew in the program. "Money from subsidies for PiS or for charity?" - Mr. Tadeusz from Krapkowice wanted to know. "According to the law, money should be...

title: A truck collides with a train in Wielkopolska. Two people are injured.
description: Two people were injured in a collision between a truck and a train in Wielkopolska. The accident occurred on the route from Szydłów to Zawada in Piła County.

title: Soldier shot at civilians. Commander for RMF FM: There were no problems with him before
description: "The rapid reaction forces acted immediately. Two minutes after the signal that the soldier had left the unit, we had all the people on standby" - General Arkadiusz Szkutnik, commander-in-chief of military operations in Podlasie, tells RMF FM about the incident in Mielnik. On New Year's Day, a 24-year-old soldier shot at a car driven by a father and his 13-year-old daughter. We also talk to the commander of the Safe Podlasie operation about the sense of security of the region's residents and ask how the tactics of migrants trying to illegally cross our eastern border have changed...

title: Massive fire in Los Angeles. Evacuation of 30,000 people, "apocalyptic scenes"
description: Firefighters are battling a brush and tree fire in Pacific Palisades, a district of Los Angeles full of celebrity residences. On Tuesday, the fire spread to 510 hectares in a matter of hours. 30,000 residents were ordered to evacuate due to life-threatening conditions. "This could mean the difference between life and death," said Margaret Stewart, a spokeswoman for the fire department, quoted by CNN. The media is calling it an "apocalyptic situation." Joe Biden has issued a statement and an appeal to residents.

title: Problems with heating and hot water. Szczecin is fighting a failure
description: Some residents of Szczecin may have cold radiators and cold water in their taps. The Szczecin CHP plant has failed and has not supplied heat to the system since Tuesday evening. It is not yet known how quickly the fault will be fixed.

title: Razem Deputy Chairman: Biejat decided to cheat her own party
description: "Magdalena Biejat made a choice. When Razem decided to go into opposition, she decided that she was part of Donald Tusk's camp and decided to basically cheat her own party (...). Magdalena Biejat made certain promises to the Razem party: that she would respect the results of the party referendum, that under no circumstances would she run in the elections for family reasons" - said Maciej Konieczny, deputy chairman of the Razem Party's Parliamentary Group, in Rozmowa at 7:00 on Radio RMF24.

title: Tenement house explosion in Cieszyn. Identity of two victims confirmed
description: The identity of two people who died under the rubble of a collapsed tenement house in Cieszyn has been identified. They are a 46-year-old man and a 78-year-old woman - residents of the building.

title: Tragic year on the roads. Terrifying data on victims
description: 1881 people died in 2024 on Polish roads, and nearly 25 thousand were injured. There were over 21.5 thousand accidents. These are preliminary data, reported by Senior Commissioner Robert Opas from the Road Traffic Office of the Police Headquarters.

title: Ukrainian Strike on Russian Air Force Base: Kremlin Responds
description: Ukrainian drones attacked a fuel depot in the city of Engels in the Saratov region in western Russia. A fire broke out there, and about 25 strong explosions could be heard - the independent Russian channel Astra reported on Telegram on Wednesday morning. There is a Russian strategic air base in Engels.

title: Trudeau to Trump: Canada Will Never Become Part of the US
description: There is not the slightest chance that Canada will become part of the United States - Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau wrote on social media, commenting on the statements of American president-elect Donald Trump on the annexation of Canada.

title: NATO mission in the Baltic Sea. They are sending ships
description: Around 10 NATO ships will take part in the mission to protect underwater infrastructure in the Baltic Sea. They will sail near cables and other installations to reduce the risk of further acts of sabotage in the region. The first ships will appear at sea at the end of the week. The operation is to last until April, Finnish radio Yle reported.

title: Several hundred marijuana bushes, 3 thousand methamphetamine tablets. Police strike against drug trade
description: Over 500 cannabis bushes, specialist equipment for their cultivation, ready-made marijuana and nearly 3,000 methamphetamine tablets with a black market value of over PLN 1 million were seized officers of the Central Bureau of Investigation of the Police in the West Pomeranian Voivodeship. Investigators also detained a 49-year-old man who is associated with the cultivation and trade of drugs.

title: The 560-year-old Jan Maria bell was "awakened" in Stargard
description: The largest medieval bell in Western Pomerania, located in the tower of the church of St. John the Baptist in Stargard, rang after several decades of silence. Its renovation cost over PLN 400,000. According to historians and bell founders, it is the third instrument of this class in Poland.

title: The senior wanted to drink tea. She had walked over 20 kilometers
description: A 78-year-old woman from a small town in Siedlce County walked over 20 kilometers at night along a national road. She passed her home and went in the opposite direction. Thanks to the police, the disoriented and hypothermic senior citizen was taken to hospital.

title: End of an era. Didier Deschamps bids farewell to France national team
description: Didier Deschamps confirmed on Wednesday that he will stop coaching the French national football team after the 2026 World Cup. "You have to be able to say stop," the coach said.

description: "Tagesspiegel": More schools in Brandenburg offer Polish language courses

description: Polish schools abroad are gaining importance

description: Bilingualism as an important asset of living in a multicultural world

description: In winter, it is a deadly disease in Poland. Twice as many deaths

description: 13-year-old hit at crosswalk. Police question driver

description: KO MP: First the Supreme Court reform, then the issue of subsidies for PiS
