description: Weather forecast for winter break. IMGW says about anomaly

title: The Windmill Act is Back. "We've Learned Our Lesson"
description: The Windmill Act is Back. "We've Learned Our Lesson"

title: Should PiS receive funds? The National Electoral Commission chief makes the matter clear
description: Should PiS receive funds? The National Electoral Commission chief makes the matter clear

title: Hołownia to announce election date. Must agree on "technical details"
description: Sejm Speaker Szymon Hołownia announced that he would announce the date of the presidential elections on Wednesday around 2:30 or 3 p.m. He will meet earlier with the chairman of the National Electoral Commission Sylwester Marciniak to - as he said - agree on "technical details".

title: Canada to Become the 51st US State? Trump Already Releases New Map
description: President-elect Donald Trump has been making quite controversial plans for several weeks regarding the enlargement of the USA. He would like to take over Greenland, the Panama Canal, and also absorb his neighbor - Canada. A few hours ago, on his social platform Truth Social, he published a new map of the USA.

title: Hunting for Putin's soldiers: A rain of missiles and drones fell on Russians
description: The Ukrainians' clever patent is proving its worth on the front. The Security Service of Ukraine published recordings from the vicinity of Pokrovsk, where the Russians were attacked by missiles and combat drones. Interestingly, the defenders of Kiev used a "home-made" Sivalka VM-8 rocket launcher to fire. It is capable of firing 16 missiles. It uses 80 mm S-8 rockets, which are usually fired from military aircraft or helicopters, and in this case they were fired from a launcher mounted on a Ukrainian vehicle. The most common solution among missiles are high-explosive fragmentation variants. There is also no shortage of S-8DF thermobaric warheads and S-8T anti-tank warheads with a tandem cumulative warhead that easily burns through reactive armor. This type of missile was specifically designed for the attack in the recording. In addition, three combat drone operators targeted a 9K37 Buk system that was going to take up position to attack Ukrainian targets. However, General Syrski's soldiers were faster and with controlled strikes tore the occupiers' weapons to pieces.

title: Kaczyński on the Supreme Court elections. "Complete nonsense"
description: - Complete nonsense. The Chamber is completely legal and referring to European courts makes no sense - said Jarosław Kaczyński, asked by journalists in the Sejm about possible changes in the Supreme Court.

title: Together accuses Magdalena Biejat. "Treason for the party"
description: Maciej Konieczny, deputy chairman of the Razem Party, accused Magdalena Biejat of betraying the party. The MP allegedly ignored the results of the party referendum and joined Donald Tusk's camp.

title: Hołownia responds to threats. "The services will do everything"
description: Szymon Hołownia responded to threats against Jerzy Owsiak. - The services will do everything to punish these people - declared the Speaker of the Sejm.

title: Threats against Owsiak and WOŚP. There is a reaction from the Ministry of Interior and Administration
description: There is an investigation into threats against Jerzy Owsiak and WOŚP - the WP's findings were confirmed by Jacek Dobrzyński, spokesman for the Minister of Internal Affairs. The case is being handled by the Warsaw police. "There is no and never will be tolerance for spreading hatred," Dobrzyński wrote.

title: Los Angeles Fire: Kamala Harris' Home in Danger
description: The fight against the fire in Pacific Palisades, a district of Los Angeles full of celebrity residences, is still ongoing. On Tuesday, in a few hours, the fire spread to 510 hectares. Tens of thousands of residents have been ordered to evacuate. According to NBC News, Kamala Harris' residence is also at risk.

title: Irregularities in RCL. PiS MP wants to waive his own immunity
description: Before the holidays, the spokeswoman for the Prosecutor General, Prosecutor Anna Adamiak, informed that Prosecutor General Adam Bodnar had submitted applications to the Sejm to lift the immunities of Jan Krzysztof Ardanowski and Krzysztof Szczucki. In the case of Szczucki, Prosecutor Adamiak reported that when he was president of the Government Legislation Center, he employed people he indicated in the established Department of Education and Communication without a competitive procedure. Additionally, these people did not work for the RCL and instead "provided assistance to the MP in his election campaign by organizing meetings and undertaking promotional activities." In the program "Tłit" WP, the PiS MP spoke on this matter. - I want to clear my name as soon as possible and I hope that the prosecutor or the court will honestly listen to what I have to say and the case will be closed once and for all - said Szczucki. The host of the program, Michał Wróblewski, asked if the politician intends to waive his immunity. - I am inclined to do so, it will probably be so. I only received an application to waive my immunity this week, so I am still in the process of analyzing it - replied the guest of the program. He explained that he wanted to clarify this matter anyway, so "involving the entire Sejm in this makes no sense". Referring to the allegations, Szczucki stated that it is "absolutely untrue". - This is the thesis that allegedly RCL employees did nothing, which is absolutely untrue, this notorious department, about which so much is said, organized numerous trainings, workshops, seminars - he added.

title: Scandal in the Church. Father Henryk Sz. faces 15 years in prison
description: Henryk Sz., a priest teaching religion at a school in the Oława commune (Lower Silesia), will be held accountable in court for sexually abusing an underage student. The man faces up to 15 years in prison.

title: Szydło supported Nawrocki. Behind the scenes of the PiS staff movement. "There will be no replacement"
description: Despite rumors about Beata Szydło's grand return to the presidential campaign of the candidate supported by PiS, the former prime minister will not take up any formal function in either the campaign team or the support committee - Karol Nawrocki's campaign staff tell Wirtualna Polska. As they emphasize: at least not in the near future. - There will be no replacement of the candidate - they add.

title: They are threatening to kill Owsiak. The police have taken up the case. "We are conducting activities"
description: The head of WOŚP Jurek Owsiak published an entry in which he reported threats directed at him. The incident was reported to the police. The Warsaw Police Headquarters confirms that it is conducting activities in this case.

title: Incident involving a soldier in Mielnik. Commander speaks out
description: On New Year's Day in Mielnik there was a dangerous incident involving a 24-year-old soldier who shot at a civilian car. As reported by RMF24, the perpetrator was under the influence of alcohol. The investigation is to explain the motives of his actions.

title: Incredible Aerial Photos: Fire Devastates LA Area
description: The horror in California continues. Strong winds are helping the fire spread quickly in the Pacific Palisades seaside district in Los Angeles. Tens of thousands of people have been evacuated, many others are trapped in their homes, unable to contact emergency services. According to the media, this is the worst fire in LA's history. The photos and footage of the element are terrifying.

title: Massive fire in Russia. Drone "debris" hit Engels
description: Ukrainian drones attacked a fuel depot in the city of Engels in the Saratov region in western Russia. According to information from independent Russian channels, the depot stores aviation fuel for the Russian strategic air base located in the city.

title: Confession of an SEO Expert: "The Pressure of Fighting for Traffic Is Exhausting People Working in Portals"
description: Anyone who worked in a portal in the era of Google and Facebook doesn't laugh in a circus. And if they do, it's through tears. I invite you to a big conversation with Jakub Sawa, an experienced digital specialist, about how it really is with Google, SEO, Discover and the fight for traffic with publishers.

title: New news channel in Polish. The editorial team includes Blajer and Laskowska
description: On Wednesday, January 15, the Polish language version of Euronews will be launched again - the Wirtualnemedia.pl portal has learned. According to our information, Paweł Blajer, previously associated with TVP Info and TVN24, has been appointed head of the pan-European news channel's office in Warsaw. The editor of the channel is Agnieszka Laskowska, who recently said goodbye to Polsat News.

title: Why Politics Is Coming Back to Facebook: And Why It Should Scare Us
description: Political content will return to Facebook with full force, and "censorship" - as Mark Zuckerberg called content moderation - will end. This should be read as terrible news for societies on both sides of the ocean. The words of the Meta boss should be read especially carefully, because they also contain terrible predictions for the media and people who fight bigtech to respect their rights.

title: Return to Poland B in the new Netflix series. Review of "Dog Hill"
description: In the fall of 2023, Netflix debuted "Informacja zwrotna". However, this is not the end of the adaptation of Jakub Żulczyk's prose. This time, the platform has released a five-episode series "Wzgórze pies". The script was written by the author of the novel together with director Piotr Domalewski. The series tells the story of difficult returns to the family home and life in the so-called B. Poland.

title: There will be another TV multiplex. We know when the search for its operator will begin
description: The number of digital terrestrial television multiplexes will increase again. The Office of Electronic Communications is finalizing preparations for the competition for the MUX-5 operator - We expect that the competition may be announced at the beginning of March this year - informs Wirtualnemedia.pl a representative of the Office of Electronic Communications.

title: Radio Łódź "cuts out the region"? Local correspondents are leaving the station
description: Local correspondents are leaving Radio Łódź. Two left in the fall, and now two more people are leaving the station. - We didn't fire anyone. These people decided to change jobs themselves - explains Monika Czerska, the station's program director, to Wirtualnemedia.pl. She assures that obtaining information from the region is not at risk, and there is more local content on air than under the previous bosses in 2023.

title: Change after 23 years. Lech Kaczoń stopped leading the Outdoor Advertising Chamber
description: Lech Kaczoń is no longer the director and president of the board of the OOHlife Chamber of Commerce. He held these positions for 23 years. The Chamber has now elected new authorities - Wojciech Wójcik, president of the RW Media Group, has become its president.

title: Washington Post's Bad Run: Layoffs Recent, Now Layoffs
description: The Washington Post, owned by Amazon founder Jeff Bezos, plans to lay off about 4 percent of its employees. Several people left the paper in the fall, including its editor-in-chief, after it, contrary to tradition, did not endorse any candidate in the U.S. presidential election.

title: Another departure from TVN's "Fakty". Two departments merged
description: Michał Wituła, head of the graphics department of "Fakty" TVN, has said goodbye to the company after nearly 17 years. As the Wirtualnemedia.pl portal has learned, the company has undergone restructuring, which has combined the graphics departments of the leading daily TVN and the TVN24 news channel.

title: Radio Nowy Świat costs up by one million zlotys. However, patrons are growing
description: Since mid-December, the group of patrons of Radio Nowy Świat has grown by 600 people, and twice as many previous donors have increased their contributions to the station. This is the result of regular appeals from the editor-in-chief for financial support for the radio, whose operating costs - partly due to inflation - have increased by one million złoty in the past year. However, as representatives of the station assure, the station will remain free of advertisements.

title: Republika has begun writing about show business. The service will be taken over by the former editor-in-chief of "Super Express"
description: The recently launched show business service Blask Online by TV Republika will be spun off into a new company, where the head and one of the partners will be Sławomir Jastrzębowski, formerly editor-in-chief of "Super Express" - the Wirtualnemedia.pl portal has learned. - We are creating something that I would like to read and watch myself - Jastrzębowski tells us.

title: E-commerce on the offensive. Onet and WP publishers are chasing Interia (Mediapanel from December)
description: In December, the reach advantage of the Polsat-Interia Group over Ringier Axel Springer Polska and the Wirtualna Polska Group decreased slightly. The peak of the shopping season brought record results to several e-commerce platforms. Temu has already been visited by over 15 million Polish internet users.

title: Wirtualna Polska with a new boss in the advertising office. Transfer from RASP
description: Martyna Mizerska has taken the position of head of business operations in the advertising office of Wirtualna Polska. She will be responsible for optimizing and unifying operational processes.

title: Tomasz Raczek on parting ways with Channel Zero. "I won't let myself spit"
description: Tomasz Raczek spoke about the reasons for parting ways with Channel Zero. - The last area that interests Channel Zero viewers is culture. An additional element was that comments under my broadcasts were absolutely unacceptable - said the film critic.

title: VML Poland with a new creative director. Dawid Szczepaniak with a new role
description: Dawid Szczepaniak is leaving his position as creative director of the strategic and creative agency VML Poland after 16 years. He will be replaced in this role by Piotr Osiński.

title: New head of communication for Polenergia Group. He joined from Qemetica
description: Mirosław Kuk has taken the position of head of communications & PR at the Polenergia Group. For the last eight years he has been associated with the Qemetica industrial group (formerly Ciech).

title: Marketing Communication Association SAR has a new director. She won the competition
description: Katarzyna Chodacka joined the SAR Marketing Communication Association team on January 2 as strategic and operational director.

title: Magda Gessler in a completely new role. The new program gave TVN the position of leader in the commercial group
description: "Magda cooks the Internet" is a new TVN program in which Magda Gessler talks to famous people. The first episode of the program, broadcast on Sunday, was watched by over 660 thousand viewers.

title: How many viewers did the program "As the saying goes, or Kasia u Bralczyka" have?
description: On average, 202 thousand viewers watched the program "Jak to się słowa, czyli Kasia Bralczyka" broadcast on TVP2 on Sunday afternoons - according to Nielsen data. The most watched episode attracted 287 thousand viewers.

title: Streaming Giant to Rise: Disney to Merge with Fubo
description: Sports streaming company Fubo ends lawsuit against Warner Bros. Discovery, The Walt Disney Company, and Fox Corporation’s joint platform Venu Sports. Disney has decided to merge Hulu Live TV with Fubo, creating one of the largest pay-TV providers in the U.S.

title: Broadcaster of new terrestrial station with 4 million profit. But no dividend planned
description: Red Carpet Media Group, which broadcasts, among others, the ViDoc TV station broadcast on digital terrestrial television, has only recently published its financial report for 2023. The nearly PLN 4 million of net profit generated in this period is to be added to its reserve capital.

title: CEO of naTemat Group leaves the company
description: Paulina Plenkiewicz, the current CEO of naTemat Group, is leaving the company. Plenkiewicz was associated with the company for 12 years, and for 4 years held the position of president.

title: More than 150 journalists: the text in "Press" is a lampoon and a gross abuse. The editorial office complains about hate
description: An open letter in which an article in the monthly "Press" about Magdalena Kicińska was assessed as a "lampoon", "violent revenge, and in human terms - plain meanness", was signed by over 150 journalists and publicists. The editor-in-chief and owner of the magazine, Andrzej Skworz, whose improper behavior towards his subordinates was revealed over two years ago, does not agree with such an assessment, and many critics accuse them of having been "clearly manipulated into untruths". Skworz and the author of the text, Mariusz Kowalczyk, emphasize that they have been the target of hate.

title: Zbigniew Hołdys returns with his columns
description: Musician Zbigniew Hołdys began writing columns for the portal naTemat.pl (Glob360). Previously, he had been a columnist for the weekly "Newsweek Polska" for a dozen or so years.

title: Biedronka's marketing manager in the anniversary ad
description: The Biedronka chain of stores (Jeronimo Martins Polska) has launched a nationwide campaign to celebrate its 30th anniversary in Poland. The heroine of the ads telling the story of the brand is the chain's marketing manager Dorota Wrotek-Gut.

title: "A Wife for a Pole" is Sunday's hit on TVP1
description: After "The Farmer Wants a Wife" and "Sanatorium miłości", it's time for "Żona dla Polaka". The first episode of the new dating program on TVP1 was watched by an average of 1.11 million viewers - according to Nielsen data.

title: "Design Alive" has a new editor-in-chief
description: Martyna Bednarska-Ćwiek has been appointed editor-in-chief of the magazine “Design Alive”. She has worked in its editorial office for over 3 years.

title: Pornography not for children. The government is preparing a law
description: Service providers offering, for example, pornographic content will be required to verify the age of recipients - assumes the draft law on the protection of minors from access to harmful content on the Internet published on Tuesday in the government's legislative work list. There will be penalties for failure to comply with the obligation.

title: Michał Czernecki in Blik's commercial with a sense of humor about transaction security
description: Actor Michał Czernecki appears in Blik's new adverts. In historical costume, he presents advice on safe online transactions.

title: Interia ends cooperation with journalist. He was accused of stealing news
description: Jan Mazurek is no longer a journalist for the Interia portal (Polsat Plus Group). A few days ago, Mazurek's former editorial colleagues from the Weszło service accused him of stealing news - having constant access to his former employer's panel, he allegedly copied content from there and published it in Interia.

title: The publisher of Meczyki has big plans. There will be an app and a new portal
description: Sebastian Felkner, CEO of OV Grupa (formerly Online Venture), presented plans for this year. The company wants to launch the Meczyki.pl application and create a new portal based on the Telepolis service, which it recently acquired.

title: There is a brave person who wants to buy TikTok in the US. Interesting information from overseas
description: TikTok's American assets may be bought by Kevin O'Leary. The sale of the business is a condition for the continued operation of the popular app in the US, set by the Joe Biden administration. TikTok is accused in the US of posing threats to national security and failing to protect user data.

title: Facebook to Become Similar to Platform X. Zuckerberg Announces Changes
description: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg announced that the company that owns Facebook, Instagram, and Threads is scrapping its fact-checking program. It will replace it with a system similar to the Community Notes found on Elon Musk's X platform.

title: New TOK FM podcast producer. She comes from "Pismo" magazine
description: Barbara Sowa has joined the editorial team of Radio TOK FM. She has become a publisher and producer of audio content. She will be responsible for the production of podcasts, including podcast series and special productions.

title: Key Polska Press services with a new editor-in-chief
description: Marek Majewski has taken over as editor-in-chief of the "Nasze Miasto" websites and titles, owned by Polska Press Grupa. This brand includes 500 websites with an urban character. The position had been vacant since April of last year.

title: Companies will check employees' driving licenses more easily. After the tragedy, the Minister of Digital Affairs announces changes
description: In the coming days, and certainly by the end of January, the process of checking driving licenses by entrepreneurs will be automated, Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Digital Affairs Krzysztof Gawkowski announced on Tuesday. A few days ago, a man with a court ban from driving, employed by a courier company, fatally hit a 14-year-old boy.

title: Wiemy, kiedy wraca serial „The Last of Us”. Mamy zwiastun
description: The streaming service Max informed its users that the premiere of the second season of "The Last of Us" will take place sooner than expected, because in the spring. At the same time, the platform released a trailer for the series, from which it appears that we will meet the main characters five years later.

title: Poland’s Tough Media Subscription Market: “Too Much Free Content”
description: In Poland, the digital media subscription market is developing, but publishers face new challenges. - This market is still very deep, many subscriptions can be sold - assesses Tadeusz Chełstowski from Patronite. - Many titles are approaching saturation of their fan base, who have the longest history with a given brand - points out Danuta Breguła from RASP.

title: Republika broke the bank in 2024. TVP1 and TVN remained the market leaders
description: The most popular TV station in 2024 was TVP1. Republika recorded a huge increase in its audience, taking over some of TVP Info's viewers, as a result of which the channel recorded a large decline. TVN continued to lead in the group of slightly younger viewers. Among the four largest stations, TVP2 lost the most.

title: Change at the helm of Radio 357. Transfer from Wirtualnemedia.pl
description: The new head of the Internet Radio 357 is Ewa Świstuniuk, previously associated with Wirtualnemedia.pl and Grupa Infor. She will replace Paweł Sołtys at the head of the station.

title: Regional radio stations received further transfers from the government
description: Regional stations of Polish Radio received further transfers from the Ministry of Culture in December. Marcin Pulit, liquidator of Radio Kraków, informs Wirtualnemedia.pl that in the case of his station it was PLN 1.917 million.

title: Another state giant plays with WOŚP. Contract for several years
description: The insurance company PZU has signed a contract with the Great Orchestra of Christmas Charity for the years 2025-2027. The first step in the three-year cooperation will be the 33rd Finale of the Great Orchestra of Christmas Charity, which will take place in January.

title: Radio Wielkopolska tests AI services. "Speech synthesizers do not replace journalists"
description: Radio Wielkopolska is experimenting with local news services hosted by an AI presenter. The station's owner, Leszek Kozioł, does not want to talk about the details of the tests, but in an interview with Wirtualnemedia.pl he assures that artificial intelligence can improve the work of journalists and improve the sound of the station.

title: Vectra with a promotion for free internet for a year
description: The Vectra cable network has prepared a promotional offer with fast fiber-optic internet up to 1.2 Gb/s for up to 12 months for free. The company states that thanks to this option, you can save over PLN 1,600 in your household budget per year.

title: Transfers from Onet and TVN to "Question for Breakfast"
description: More people are joining the editorial team of the program "Pytanie na Śniadanie". At the beginning of 2025, the TVP2 breakfast show team was strengthened by Piotr Różycki, who took over as deputy editorial manager, and Agnieszka Mrożek, who became the program's publisher.

title: TV Republika with services for radio stations. "Interest is very high"
description: Telewizja Republika has begun offering audio news services to local radio stations. - We want to fill a gap in the market. The interest is very high - the station's director Tomasz Sakiewicz tells Wirtualnemdia.pl.

title: AI Bots Won't Flood Facebook. Meta Changes Its Mind
description: Meta planned to introduce thousands of accounts run by a generative AI tool to Facebook and Instagram that would be treated the same as human accounts, but the idea sparked so much controversy that the company decided to withdraw it.

title: Mirosława Marcheluk has died. She starred in "Wodzirej" and "Seksmisja"
description: Mirosława Marcheluk, a theatre and film actress, lecturer at the Acting Department of the Film School and former director of the New Theatre in Łódź, died on 7 January at the age of 86. The information about the actress's death was confirmed by her husband, Ryszard Mróz, in an interview with Radio Łódź.

title: Advertisement with singing monk unethical. "Lack of justification for religious thread"
description: The Advertising Ethics Commission received a complaint about an advertisement for the product Sanohepatic (Natur Produkt Zdrovit), whose protagonist is a monk. In the opinion of the KER, the advertisement violates the Code of Advertising Ethics.

title: Friendly guy Janek in the new NASK campaign
description: The NASK research institute has launched a campaign under the slogan “Be visible online”, the aim of which is to promote the .pl domain.

title: Suspicious transaction of the Dmowski Institute [SUMMARY OF THE DAY'S EVENTS]
description: We publish hundreds of texts every day, our site changes very dynamically. Here we collect the most important news of the day.

title: A bill that will not change anything. The Sejm begins work on the "rescue" Hołownia project
description: Legal Supreme Court judges are to rule on the validity of the presidential elections together with new judges - assumes the project of Marshal Szymon Hołownia. - I do not see the possibility of old and new judges ruling together, even if it were decreed by law - says one of the Supreme Court judges.

title: A strange transaction of the Dmowski Institute. Disappearing gold and a homeless man at the head of the company. The clues lead to the Łódź Fight Club
description: The sale of the building intended for the seat of the Dmowski Institute, finalized in June 2022, was a planned operation by a group of speculators originating from the Łódź Fight Club. The operation was led by a former tax official.

title: This is how the Confederation is fighting against the KO and PiS candidates. It does not like the symbol of remembrance of the ghetto uprising
description: A face mask, a ribbon in the colors of Ukraine and a daffodil pinned to the clothes of the KO and PiS candidates for president of Poland - this is what the Confederation criticizes, commenting: "No, thank you."

title: Health education will not be mandatory? Nowacka on seven changes in schools
description: What about smartphones in schools? Will the Ministry of National Education lower the permissible threshold for unexcused absences? The head of the Ministry of National Education talked about the ministry's plans for next year.

title: Telewizja Republika launches campaign against Owsiak. Appeals to give money to it, not WOŚP
description: For years, the PiS authorities did not want to support the Great Orchestra of Christmas Charity. WOŚP and Jerzy Owsiak were even fired from TVP. Now PiS is announcing that Owsiak will be held accountable, and the media sympathetic to him are urging Poles not to pay to the Orchestra.

title: GUS: the ambulance service is too slow, although the number of ambulances is increasing and there are fewer trips
description: Although we have more ambulances and there are significantly fewer trips to the sick and accident victims, it still takes the ambulance service longer to arrive at the scene of the accident than the regulations allow.

title: PiS denounces Domański in subsidy case. Accuses him of official misconduct
description: Failure to fulfill duties, i.e. the so-called official crime - this is the accusation made by PiS against the Minister of Finance. It concerns millions of zlotys, the unblocking of which Kaczyński's party is demanding by the National Electoral Commission's adoption of the PiS financial report from the 2023 parliamentary campaign.

title: Unofficially: Adrian Zandberg is Razem's candidate for president of Poland
description: According to "Wyborcza", the Razem party will make a decision on the candidate this weekend. Unofficially, it is known that it will be Adrian Zandberg.

title: Strong earthquake in Tibet and PiS's plan for the state budget [SUMMARY OF THE DAILY EVENTS]
description: We publish hundreds of texts every day, our site changes very dynamically. Here we collect the most important news of the day.

title: Razem Party attacks the ruling coalition. It shows "100 failures of the Tusk government"
description: Razem has prepared an information campaign and a list of 100 government failures over the past year. It argues: - We show irregularities, scandals, cases that have not been delivered.

title: Problems of "old-fashioned" PhD students. The Human Rights Ombudsman intervenes in the matter of unequal treatment
description: "There is unequal treatment of doctoral students, because some are exempt from fees and others are not," says the Commissioner for Human Rights and appeals for a change in the regulations.

title: Mileage in the State Forests: Former spokesman halfway to the moon
description: There have been legends about how many kilometers the Ziobro politician from Tolkmicko drove in his company car. The State Forests have finally answered our questions about Michał Gzowski's travels.

title: What awaits the new Minister of Science? List of unfinished business left after Wieczorek
description: Science is waiting for another new beginning. And a list of started and unfinished business awaits the new head or head of the ministry.

title: EU Presidency Inauguration Without Duda. Why Did He Choose to Absent?
description: The president's absence at Friday's gala inaugurating the Polish presidency of the European Union is a sign that instead of the interests of Poland, he is focusing on the interests of PiS.

title: Winter in the city 2025
description: The winter break is fast approaching! We encourage students to spend this time actively. As every year, winter in the city happens during the school break, which this year in Warsaw falls between February 3 and 16. As part of our campaign, we have prepared free sports attractions in as many as 10 centers. Check out what offers you can take advantage of!

title: Post-holiday Energy Boost - PHOTO REPORT
description: We invite you to see the photo report from yesterday's competition.

title: Photo report of the 2nd edition of Skating Thursdays
description: We invite you to see the photo report

title: Post-holiday Energy Boost
description: After the holidays, everyone could use some exercise and energy, so we invite you to the "Post-holiday energy boost" at the Polonia Centre at Konwiktorska 6. The event for basketball fans will take place on December 29 between 11:00 and 16:00, on which day the Polonia Centre will transform into a basketball hall. During the event, an outstanding Polish basketball player will participate in training and attractions. We are not revealing who it will be yet, we are keeping a secret!

title: Holiday opening hours of the centres
description: All active residents and residents of Warsaw will be able to use sports facilities during the Christmas and New Year period. The centers will operate at special hours. Therefore, before visiting your favorite place, we recommend checking the announcements.

title: Get moving, Warsaw, after the holidays
description: Together with the Warsaw City Hall, we encourage Warsaw residents to be physically active! As part of the “Get moving, Warsaw after the holidays” initiative, we provide free sports facilities that will help you take up this challenge. Let’s take care of our health together and strengthen ourselves before the New Year.

title: Choose your favorites in the 25th Plebiscite for the Best Sportsmen of Warsaw
description: The conference that begins voting in the Plebiscite for the Best Sportsmen of Warsaw is behind us. As every year, we encourage internet users to take part in the voting in the Plebiscite, the aim of which is and has always been to promote the idea of ​​sports among the residents of Warsaw and to honor the hard work and many sacrifices of Warsaw athletes.

title: II Masovian Football Gala
description: On Saturday, the 2nd Masovian Football Gala took place. In a great atmosphere, the passing year in Masovian football was summed up.

title: Registration for the Tymbark Cup is underway!
description: The next edition of the Tymbark Cup has started, sign up today.

title: Singing Christmas Carols with Seniors
description: We cordially invite you to a unique Christmas meeting, during which we will sing the most beautiful carols together and feel the magic of the upcoming holidays!

description:
